Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Immudex Dextramer CMV Kit, a semi-quantitative flow cytometry assay to enumerate CMV-specific CD8+ T cells in whole blood of adult stem cell transplant patients.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for identification and enumeration of CMV-specific CD8+ T cells in Na Heparin whole blood by flow cytometry to assess CMV-specific immune status and risk of CMV reactivation in adult human stem cell transplant patients, in conjunction with other findings; not for measurement of CMV infection or disease and limited to specific HLA types.
